item.description:
Guten Tag ihr Lieben!

I will be drinking beer with some Bedouins and Camels on Friday somewhere on the other side of the world, so unfortunately I will not be able to attend our Stammtisch this month. I have recruited Alex to be your host this Friday and I am positive he will do an excellent job while I am gone. I hope everyone attending will have a good time. The GACS for RI will be serving a special guest chef dinner:

Make sure to bring cash for food and drinks!

See you all April 19th, I hope!

 

Bis bald - viele Gruesse,

 

Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: At the Ratskeller - red door on the back of the building - look for a bunch of smiling people and the German Flag!
item.name: Stammtisch at the Pawtucket German-American Cultural Society!!!
